title: Conference: IMS-ICSDS 2025
content: I am glad to present a talk entitled Incremental Causal Effects for Time to Treatment at the 2025 IMS International Conference on Statistics and Data Science, Seville, Spain.

title: Receive Graduate and Professional Student Association Travel Grant Award
content: I am pleased to receive the Graduate and Professional Student Association Travel Grant Award, which supports my conference travel in December 2025.  I sincerely thank the Graduate and Professional Student Association at the University of California, San Diego, for their support.

title: Conference: 2025 Annual Public Health Research Day
content: I am glad to present my poster entitled Incremental Causal Effects for Time to Treatment at the Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health and Human Longevity Scienceâ€™s 2025 Annual Public Health Research Day, San Diego.

title: Paper Accepted: Incremental Causal Effect for Time to Treatment Initialization
content: This paper is published as a conference paper at the Thirteenth International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR 2025), Singapore.  My collaborator, Andrew Ying, presented a poster entitled Incremental Causal Effect for Time to Treatment Initialization at ICLR 2025, Singapore.
